questions.question:
What is the output of the following code snippet?

void main() {
    int x = 5;
    int y = x++;
    printf("%d", x + y);
}

What is the value of x after the following code?

int x = 5;
x += x++ + ++x;

What is the output of the following code snippet?

void main() {
    int x = 5;
    x = x - (x--);
    printf("%d", x);
}

What is the output of the following code snippet?

void main() {
    char str[] = "Hello, World!";
    printf("%d", sizeof(str) - 1);
}

What is the value of x after executing the following code?

int x = 5;
x = x - (x++);

What is the output of the following code snippet?

void main() {
    int x = 7;
    printf("%d", x >> 1);
}

What is the output of the following code snippet?

void main() {
    int x = 5;
    int y = 7;
    printf("%d", (x & y) << 2);
}

What is the output of the following code snippet?

void main() {
    int x = 3;
    int y = 5;
    printf("%d", x ^ y);
}

What is the output of the following code snippet?

void main() {
    int x = 10;
    int y = 20;
    int *p = &x;
    x = *p + y;
    printf("%d", x);
}

What is the output of the following code snippet?

void main() {
    int x = 10;
    int y = 20;
    int *p = &y;
    *p = x + y;
    printf("%d", y);
}

What is the output of the following code snippet?

void main() {
    int x = 10;
    int y = 5;
    x /= y;
    printf("%d", x);
}

What is the output of the following code snippet?

void main() {
    int x = 10;
    int y = 20;
    int z = x > y ? x : y;
    printf("%d", z);
}

What is the output of the following code snippet?

void main() {
    int x = 0;
    while (x++ < 5) {
        printf("%d ", x);
    }
}

What is the output of the following code snippet?

void main() {
    int x = 5;
    int y = 3;
    x *= (y + 2);
    printf("%d", x);
}

What is the output of the following code snippet?

void main() {
    int x = 10;
    int y = 5;
    x = x++ - --y;
    printf("%d", x);
}

What is the output of the following code snippet?

void main() {
    int x = 5;
    int y = 3;
    x += (y--) + (++y);
    printf("%d", x);
}

What is the output of the following code snippet?

void main() {
    int x = 5;
    int y = 3;
    int z = x > y ? x++ : y++;
    printf("%d, %d, %d", x, y, z);
}

What is the output of the following code snippet?

void main() {
    int x = 5;
    int y = 3;
    x = x > y ? x++ : y++;
    printf("%d, %d", x, y);
}

What is the output of the following code snippet?

void main() {
    int x = 10;
    int y = 5;
    x = x * y;
    printf("%d", x);
}

What is the output of the following code snippet?

void main() {
    int x = 3;
    int y = 7;
    x &= y;
    printf("%d", x);
}
